website_summaries.verdict: At the end of the day, the DSi XL is exactly the same as the DSi, so unless you're desperate for more touch-screen real estate, or your vision is impaired, we can't recommend a purchase over the original DSi.
cons: no improvements over DSi's cameras and internal storage
networking hiccups found in DSi remain
text-based games may look slightly blurry
old DSiWare games can't be transferred over to the XL

customer_reviews.title: Bought a pink one for daughter
customer_reviews.text: We did buy this refurbished and I understand that means "not new, redone". The actual DS itself is very nice and looking at it you wouldn't be able to tell it's a used one. Shipping didn't take long at all! So I give it 2 stars for the shipping and look of it. Within 24 hours of my daughter getting it and playing on it, it randomly freezes up. We have to turn it off for 24-48 hours, then it will go a bit without freezing up. At times it doesn't show a game is in, even though it clearly is. Not really recommended but it is what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Make Her Christmas!
customer_reviews.text: Product received... excellent condition. This is a nastalgic gift for my daughter... she had one when they first came out and gave it to her cousin for the newest system. Years later, her #1 gift request... she cried when she saw it.... so sweet, thanks for making her Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: A Marie Alvin

customer_reviews.title: Great but...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this awhile ago. The DSi XL itself works perfectly and it came in perfect condition. All is well until i wanted to charge the device. The charger wouldn't charge the device at all. So, it is either a problem with the battery or the charger. The customer service was really helpful though. They replied me promptly and gave me contact information of the person i need to contact. Turns out it is a problem with the charger. I couldn't be bothered to get an exchange as the shipping will cost me a lot more than if i go to the local game store and purchase a replacement charger. Once that is done, the device is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Alyndriel

customer_reviews.title: WOOOWWW
customer_reviews.text: WOOOWWW! Amazing seller this product is in mint condition with no signs of wear!!! Amazing!! I'm soo happy! And the DSI xl is so awesome compared to the ds lite, bigger screens, amazing, a little pixelated but that's not the DSI xl fault it's the game designers issues, but unless your super fixed on the pixels you cannot even tell, wonder item, amazing seller, very pleased! ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Luis & Gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: Like the color.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this color. No one has this color so I know which one is mine immediately.

customer_reviews.title: Classic
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for Nintendo DS games. Worth the upgrade if you own the original 1st model of the DS. Owning this will make you want to replay all the DS games over again. Comfortable grip and screen size. I used to squint when playing the original model, and playing the XL model is easy for the eyes. Perfect size, screen and controls.

customer_reviews.title: Great price, poor product.
customer_reviews.text: While the price is great, the system is nearly unusable. It's locked on parental controls, the screen is damaged and doesn't work along all the borders, and is etched into on the front. I recommend spending the money for a decent Dsi if you're looking for one.

customer_reviews.title: Nintendo DSi XL - Metallic Rose
customer_reviews.text: This Nintendo Dsi XL was purchased as a gift for my 5th-grade granddaughter for Xmas. It arrived in perfect condition, promptly, and I understand she has been enjoying it daily. She is thrilled with it, and I liked that I was able to find a pink-colored Nintendo Dsi XL for her. I purchased this through Amazon.com.

customer_reviews.title: dont have nintendo support
customer_reviews.text: I have a problem with the support of the product, because i tried to send to repair but IN THE NINTENDO PAGE SAYS: Unfortunately, we are not able to determine the warranty status of your Nintendo DSi/Nintendo DSi XL. On some occasions, the Nintendo product Serial Number may not have been recorded at the point of sale, and therefore is not in our system. i dont live in the USA, i i tried to send back to repair with a family that will go to USA..and said that i have to call. Who will help me?
customer_reviews.author: Glenda Llaguno

customer_reviews.title: DSiXL lives up to its expectations
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughters for Christmas, and they loved it so much, my in-laws bought them a second so they could play multiplayer. Works perfectly and with the options for wifi internet access (under adult supervision of course), camera, and free downloadable games, it is the perfect gift for tweens to use in their spare time. Highly recommend that you manage your kids play time on it, or they will never put it down, but the larger screen, internet access and general ease of use made it the perfect gift for 8-13 yr olds.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: DSI XL
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our granddaughter. She is 8 and has enjoyed not only the graphics,but the ease of use. The camera is an added bonus. We are all "twisted" and catorgorized as to how related we are! I think, this year, we won with the best gift!!

customer_reviews.title: Very happy

Our older child has one, and for my younger one we chose this console because they wanted to use the PictoChat -the 3DS does not have it- and share the games each of them have.

Also, the R button on the side is stuck in. I sent in a return request and was advised by seller that she no longer had the money to refund to me and if I could come up with another way for her to repay me. I would never buy another item from this seller.

customer_reviews.title: Charger only works in USA, if you travel you are screwed
customer_reviews.text: The DSi XL comes with a 110 Volt charger only. No wonder Ninendo is falling behind. Now a days everything from printers to TVs, not to mention laptops, mobile phones, smart phones, Apple products come with an auto volt 110-220 Volt charger so that it can be used worldwide. Imagine my aggravation, after buying the DS we flew to Europe on Xmas holiday only to find that the charger isn't auto volt and needs a transformer. Thanks for ruining my kids Xmas present, Nintendo

product_meta.title: Nintendo DSi XL - Metallic Rose
product_meta.description: The Nintendo DSi XL is a high-powered handheld video-game system with an extra large, wide viewing angle screen, and a full size, easy to hold stylus. It comes with features like touch-screen control for a unique gaming experience. Snap photos with the built-in camera edit and send them to friends, play back your music with Nintendo DSi Sound, or browse the Internet with the Nintendo DSi Browser. From playing games to just playing around, the Nintendo DSi XL does it all. Includes: Nintendo DSi XL System, 3 Pre-Installed Titles - Brain Age Express: Math, Brain Age Express: Arts & Letters and Photo Clock, two free applications: the Nintendo DSi Browser and Flipnote Studio, AC Adapter, Rechargeable Battery, Nintendo DSi XL Stylus (2), Easy Start Guide, Manuals (Basic & Controls) and Support Booklet.
feature_bullets: It comes with features like touch-screen control for a unique gaming experience.
The Nintendo DSi XL is a high-powered handheld video-game system with an extra large, wide viewing angle screen, and a full size, easy to hold stylus.

Includes: Nintendo DSi XL System, 3 Pre-Installed Titles - Brain Age Express: Math, Brain Age Express: Arts & Letters and Photo Clock, two free applications: the Nintendo DSi Browser and Flipnote Studio, AC Adapter, Rechargeable Battery, Nintendo DSi XL Stylus (2), Easy Start Guide, Manuals (Basic & Controls) and Support Booklet.
